headline: Southern Company names Hans Brown Executive Vice President & Chief Information Technology Officer
summary: Southern Company announced today that Hans Brown has been named executive vice president & Chief Information Technology Officer (CITO), effective July 31. Brown will lead Southern Company's technology strategy and digital transformation efforts, leveraging his extensive experience in global technology and innovation. He will play a vital role in how the company continues working to embrace technology, data and analytics, AI, and innovation to best meet customers' changing needs and continue to g

headline: Southern Company elects Regions Financial Corp. chairman, president & CEO John Turner to Board of Directors
summary: The Board of Directors of Southern Company today announced the election of John M. Turner, Jr. as an independent director, effective Sept. 1, 2025.

raw.headline: Southern Company elects Regions Financial Corp. chairman, president & CEO John Turner to Board of Directors
raw.summary: The Board of Directors of Southern Company today announced the election of John M. Turner, Jr. as an independent director, effective Sept. 1, 2025.

headline: Southern Company announces quarterly dividend
summary: Southern Company today announced a regular quarterly dividend of 74 cents per share on the company's common stock, payable September 8, 2025, to shareholders of record as of August 18, 2025.
